meanings.definition: A small, fleshy, leg-like appendage on the abdomen of certain insect larvae.
meanings.sent1: The caterpillar used its prolegs to grip onto the leaf tightly.
meanings.sent2: The insect larva moved slowly using its prolegs to crawl along the ground.
meanings.sent3: The prolegs of the caterpillar wiggled comically as it tried to climb the stem.
meanings.sent4: Her prolegs were like tiny hooks, helping her navigate the rough terrain.
meanings.sent5: The prolegs of the larva were so delicate, resembling miniature legs on its body.
